column4: do you have any ideas why olivier_ might not be able to VNC into a box he has VNC server on, port 5901 forwarded to, etc?
I know (almost) nothing about VNC.  So, assuming the forwarding is proper, and he's connecting to the right IP.  Nope
off topic, but are you in here often? :)
Indeed. Also, we do have #ubuntu-offtopic if you have offtopic questions
